other_tests.findings: Microbiological investigations revealed that blood and bronchoalveolar lavage cultures were positive for Pseudomonas aeruginosa (PA) with a good sensitivity profile.

other_tests.date: First analysis: Not specified; Second analysis: Six hours after admission
other_tests.findings: First analysis documented hypoxia (pO2 52 mmHg, SpO2 90%); Second analysis showed respiratory and lactic acidosis (pH 7.1 mmHg, PaO2 45 mmHg, SpO2 73.3% in oxygen therapy FiO2 100%, lactates 9.7 mmol/L).
other_tests.changes_over_time: Decline in oxygen levels and acid-base status worsened over six hours.
